// Registers:
//
//   Name                    Reg   Size
//   ----------------------- ----- ----
//   ShadowModulateColor     c0       1
//   ScreenPositionScaleBias c1       1
//   MinZ_MaxZRatio          c2       1
//   NvStereoEnabled         c3       1
//   PSRRealDCoefficients1   c8       1

//   ScreenToShadowMatrix    c13      4
//   SampleOffsets           c17      2
//   LightPosition           c19      1
//   FalloffParameters       c20      1
//   SpotDirection           c21      1
//   SpotAngles              c22      1
//   SceneColorTexture       s0       1
//   NvStereoFixTexture      s1       1
//   ShadowDepthTexture      s2       1
//

    ps_3_0
    def c4, 0.0625, 0, 9.98999977, 0.693147182
    def c5, 0.693147182, 1, -1, 0.999000013
    def c6, 1, 0, 0.25, 0
    dcl_texcoord v0
    dcl_2d s0
    dcl_2d s1
    dcl_2d s2

def c220, 0, 1, 0.0625, 0.5
dcl_2d s13


// Unreal Engine stereo correction disabled by DarkStarSword's shadertool.py:
// shadertool.py -i -f --auto-fix-unreal-shadows --only-autofixed --git CRC32_24A1A9E_0.txt
def c3, 0, 0, 0, 0 // Overrides NvStereoEnabled passed from Unreal Engine


// Unreal Engine shadow fix inserted with DarkStarSword's shadertool.py:
// shadertool.py -i -f --auto-fix-unreal-shadows --only-autofixed --git CRC32_24A1A9E_0.txt
texldl r6, c220.z, s13
mov r5, v0
add r6.w, r5.w, -r6.y
mad r5.x, r6.w, r6.x, r5.x

    abs r0.x, c3.x
    if_ne c3.x, -c3.x
      texld r1, c4, s1
      add r0.y, -r1.y, r5.w
      mad r1.x, r1.x, r0.y, r5.x
      mov r1.yz, r5.xyww
    else
      mov r1.xyz, c4.y
    endif
    add r0.y, c4.z, r5.z
    add r0.z, r0.y, c8.x
    log r0.z, r0.z
    mul r0.z, r0.z, c8.y
    mov r0.w, c4.w
    mad r0.w, r0.z, r0.w, c8.z
    mul r0.w, r0.w, c8.x
    mad r0.z, r0.z, -c5.x, c5.y
    add r0.z, r0.z, -c8.z
    rcp r0.z, r0.z
    mul r0.z, r0.z, r0.w
    rcp r0.y, r0.y
    mul r0.y, r0.y, r0.z
    rcp r0.y, r0.y
    add r0.y, r0.y, c5.z
    dp2add r2.x, c8.w, r0.y, r5.x
    mov r2.yz, r5.xyww
    cmp r0.xyz, -r0.x, r2, r1
    rcp r0.z, r0.z
    mul r0.xy, r0.z, r0
    mad r0.xy, r0, c1, c1.wzzw
    mov r0.zw, c4.y
    texldl r0, r0, s0
    mov r0.yz, c5
    add r0.x, r0.y, -c2.y
    add r0.x, -r0.x, r0.w
    rcp r0.x, r0.x
    mul r0.x, r0.x, -c2.x
    rcp r0.y, r5.w
    mul r0.yw, r0.y, r5.xxzy
    mul r0.yw, r0.x, r0
    mul r1, r0.w, c14

// Unreal Engine shadow fix inserted with DarkStarSword's shadertool.py:
// shadertool.py -i -f --auto-fix-unreal-shadows --only-autofixed --git CRC32_24A1A9E_0.txt
add r6.w, r0.x, -r6.y
mad r0.y, -r6.w, r6.x, r0.y

    mad r1, c13, r0.y, r1
    mad r1, c15, r0.x, r1
    add r1, r1, c16
    rcp r1.w, r1.w
    min r2.z, r1.z, c5.w
    mad_pp r3, r1.xyxy, r1.w, c17
    mad r2.xyw, r3.xyzx, c6.xxzy, c6.yyzx
    texldp_pp r4, r2, s2
    mad r2.xyw, r3.zwzx, c6.xxzy, c6.yyzx
    texldp r3, r2, s2
    add_pp r1.z, r3.x, r4.x
    mad_pp r3, r1.xyxy, r1.w, c18
    mov_pp r2.xy, r3
    texldp r4, r2, s2
    add_pp r1.x, r1.z, r4.x
    mov_pp r2.xy, r3.zwzw
    texldp r2, r2, s2
    add_pp r1.x, r1.x, r2.x
    mul_pp r1.x, r1.x, c6.z
    mul r1.yzw, r0.w, c10.xxyz
    mad r1.yzw, c9.xxyz, r0.y, r1
    mad r0.xyw, c11.xyzz, r0.x, r1.yzzw
    add r0.xyw, r0, c12.xyzz
    add r0.xyw, -r0, c19.xyzz
    mul r0.xyw, r0, c19.w
    dp3 r1.y, r0.xyww, r0.xyww
    rsq r1.y, r1.y
    rcp r1.z, r1.y
    mad r1.z, r1.z, c20.y, c20.z
    max r2.x, r1.z, c4.y
    mad r1.z, r2.x, -r2.x, c5.y
    max r2.x, r1.z, c4.y
    pow_pp r1.z, r2.x, c20.x
    mul r0.xyw, r0, r1.y
    dp3 r0.x, r0.xyww, -c21
    add r0.x, r0.x, -c22.x
    mul_sat r0.x, r0.x, c22.y
    mul r0.x, r0.x, r0.x
    mul_pp r0.x, r0.x, r1.z
    add r2, r0.z, c0
    mad r0, r0.x, r2, c5.y
    mul r1.x, r1.x, r1.x
    add r2, -r0, c5.y
    mad oC0, r1.x, r2, r0

// approximately 91 instruction slots used (7 texture, 84 arithmetic)
